help.title: Help/How to search
description: Search for items by name or ID. For example, type 'Primogem' or '201'.
Use ';;' to search for multiple items at once. For example: 'Primogem;;Mora;;Hero's Wit'.
You can search across multiple categories simultaneously.
Refine your search by selecting specific categories from the dropdown menu.
The search is not case-sensitive, so 'primogem' and 'Primogem' will yield the same results.
